adminLogin.title: Manager Login
adminLogin.subtitle: Sign in to manage event data
adminLogin.resetEmailSent: Password reset link has been sent to your email
adminLogin.resetInstructions: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
adminLogin.rememberMeTooltip: Your browser will also offer to save your password securely

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unknownError: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.resetFailed: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.

resetPassword.title: Set New Password
resetPassword.instructions: Enter your new password below. Make it secure!

errors.invalidToken: This reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.tokenExpired: This reset link has expired. Reset links are only valid for 60 seconds after being sent. Please go back to the login page and request a new reset link.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.updateFailed: Failed to update password. Please try again.

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.description: Manage admin users, roles, and permissions
userManagement.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {{email}}?
userManagement.inviteSuccessMessage: User will receive an email to set their password.

implementation.title: Server-side API Required
implementation.message: Full user management requires server-side implementation using Supabase Admin API. Currently showing mock data. Contact your developer to enable edit/delete functionality.

errors.requiresServerApi: This action requires server-side API implementation

organization.title: Organization Profile
organization.description: Organization name, logo, and contact information

mapDefaults.description: Default map layers, zoom levels, and map settings
